title.rendered: Open Text Technologies India Pvt. Ltd partners with Smile Foundation to provide health services to the needy

content.rendered:
Open Text Technologies India Pvt. Ltd partners with Smile Foundation to provide health services to the needy

 

Under its CSR objectives, Open Text has been actively focusing on their health mandate and in one such association, OpenText has joined hands with Smile Foundation to provide preventive, curative and referral health services to underprivileged community in the slum pockets of Hyderabad through Smile on Wheels. OpenText and Smile Foundation’s joint initiative began in the year 2016 and since then it is supporting health projects to serve the needy communities of Hyderabad.

OpenText Corporation (also written opentext) is a Canadian company that develops and sells enterprise information management (EIM) software. OpenText, headquartered in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada, is Canada’s largest software company as of 2014 and recognized as one of Canada’s Top 100 Employers 2016 by Mediacorp Canada Inc. OpenText software applications manage content or unstructured data for large companies, government agencies, and professional service firms. OpenText aims its products at addressing information management requirements, including management of large volumes of content, compliance with regulatory requirements, and mobile and online experience management.
